amendment.description: To provide for a period of continuing appropriations in the event of a lapse in appropriations under the normal appropriations process, and establish procedures and consequences in the event of a failure to enact appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1232, under the order of 10/24/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 269.

action.text: Amendment SA 1232 proposed by Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5176-5177) To provide for a period of continuing appropriations in the event of a lapse in appropriations under the normal appropriations process, and establish procedures and consequences in the event of a failure to enact appropriations.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1232, under the order of 10/24/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 269.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1232, under the order of 10/24/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 269.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1232 proposed by Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 1092.
